SEARCH
Module JEDI_FlipFit_GroupD_POS_Project
Package com.flipkart.business.interfaces

Interface IFlipFitGymOwner

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitGymOwnerBusiness
public interface IFlipFitGymOwner
Interface defining the business logic for managing gym owner operations. Provides methods for adding and viewing gym centres, managing payments, editing owner details, and handling owner registration and login.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    FlipFitGymCentre
    addCentre(FlipFitGymCentre flipFitGymCentre)
    Adds a new gym centre under the ownership of the gym owner.
    FlipFitSlots
    addSlot(FlipFitSlots flipFitSlot)
    Adds a new slot to a gym centre.
    FlipFitGymOwner
    editDetails(FlipFitGymOwner flipFitGymOwner)
    Edits the details of the gym owner.
    FlipFitUser
    login(FlipFitUser user)
    Logs in a gym owner using their credentials.
    FlipFitGymOwner
    registerOwner(FlipFitGymOwner owner)
    Registers a new gym owner with the given details.
    List<FlipFitGymCentre>
    viewCentres(FlipFitGymOwner flipFitGymOwner)
    Retrieves a list of gym centres owned by the specified gym owner.
    List<FlipFitPayments>
    viewPayments()
    Retrieves a list of all payments related to the gym owner or their centres.

  • Method Details

    • addCentre

      FlipFitGymCentre addCentre(FlipFitGymCentre flipFitGymCentre) throws InvalidChoiceException
      Adds a new gym centre under the ownership of the gym owner.
      Parameters:
      flipFitGymCentre - the FlipFitGymCentre object containing details of the new gym centre
      Returns:
      the added FlipFitGymCentre object after successfully adding it to the system
      Throws:
      InvalidChoiceException - if the gym centre details are invalid or incomplete

    • viewCentres

      List<FlipFitGymCentre> viewCentres(FlipFitGymOwner flipFitGymOwner)
      Retrieves a list of gym centres owned by the specified gym owner.
      Parameters:
      flipFitGymOwner - the FlipFitGymOwner object whose centres are to be viewed
      Returns:
      a List of FlipFitGymCentre objects representing the gym centres owned by the owner

    • viewPayments

      List<FlipFitPayments> viewPayments()
      Retrieves a list of all payments related to the gym owner or their centres.
      Returns:
      a List of FlipFitPayments representing the payments made to the gym owner

    • editDetails

      FlipFitGymOwner editDetails(FlipFitGymOwner flipFitGymOwner) throws InvalidChoiceException
      Edits the details of the gym owner.
      Parameters:
      flipFitGymOwner - the FlipFitGymOwner object containing updated details
      Returns:
      the updated FlipFitGymOwner object after modifications
      Throws:
      InvalidChoiceException - if the owner makes an invalid choice or provides invalid details

    • registerOwner

      FlipFitGymOwner registerOwner(FlipFitGymOwner owner)
      Registers a new gym owner with the given details.
      Parameters:
      owner - the FlipFitGymOwner object containing the owner's registration details
      Returns:
      the registered FlipFitGymOwner object after successful registration

    • login

      FlipFitUser login(FlipFitUser user)
      Logs in a gym owner using their credentials.
      Parameters:
      user - the FlipFitUser object containing the gym owner's login credentials (email and password)
      Returns:
      the FlipFitUser object after successful login, or null if login fails

    • addSlot

      FlipFitSlots addSlot(FlipFitSlots flipFitSlot)
      Adds a new slot to a gym centre.
      Parameters:
      flipFitSlot - the FlipFitSlots object containing the details of the new slot
      Returns:
      the added FlipFitSlots object after successfully adding it to the system
